entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK resolver failure when an older SDK is also installed #35334
  • dotnet templating: Condition on csproj ItemGroup item removes entire line from output #35312
  • ailed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E #35307
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET8 preview RC2 installed on Loc OS, some hyperlinks should be redirected to Loc hyperlink. #35292
  • Add a test on sdk side to error out when tool install non-tool items #35289

Closed

  • HandleTypeLoadFailure is failing in CI #35264
  • Baseline manifest SxS support in installer repo for file-based installs #34280
  • `-a` sets app to framework-dependent when `SelfContained` is `true` #34026
    8.0.1xx
  • Add path to global.json in SDK resolution error message when it's available #25823
    7.0.4xx
  • Cannot install any tool using `dotnet tool install <package-id>` on .Net 7.0.400 SDK #35261

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #35328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #35326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35325
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #35324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #35315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dependency on non shipping package and use it's version #35310
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix package version in Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #35309
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Improve test logging, reliability #35265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove SelfContained set to false for -a #35286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix redist.csproj build failure on SLN rebuild in VS #35280
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #35316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #35317
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #35318
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #35319
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #35320
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement automated cleanup of stage 0 #34693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Asp.Net FrameworkReference in BrowserRefresh #35282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Msbuild.Test.Utilites build fix for VS #35281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add support for Haiku #35231
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update .editorconfig template #35268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Container Build: Add OCI Archive Format writing #35204
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Containers] Validate that user applications will run on the selected base image #35246
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use MVC extensions from Razor transport #35273
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35275
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
